/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. Vehicles of various types, including cars and trucks, traverse the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the greenery below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
